value.text:
Hi Russell,
We are hoping to be in Vancouver in or around Aug 5 th.
Derek has offered us to stay at his house. But I would like to visit you also in Squamish if it is possible.  I guess Both Philippe and Derek are planning to spend time in Whistler. We will float around in hope to see everyone! And hope that I donâ€™t experience pain to keep me from moving around!
Are you planning any trips or visits?
This is a longer message with some interesting things to say about the weekend, and life and so on.
